title: Women's Wide Leg Jeans High Waisted Stretchy Trendy Casual Versatile Work Denim Pants Trousers 2025
description: Premium Material: Made from a blend of 97% cotton and 3% polyester, Supgoreou marine jeans offer the perfect balance of comfort and durability. The fabric is stretchy and designed to be wider in the leg and smaller in the waist, making them ideal for hourglass or triangle body shapes.

Trendy Design: These high rise women's jeans feature a stylish frayed hem, belt loops, adding a touch of Y2K fashion. The back boasts two large pockets for a practical yet chic look. With a secure zipper and button closure, these jeans are easy to wear and ensure a snug fit.

Flattering Fit: The high-waisted design enhances your waistline while the wide-leg cut provides a flattering silhouette for virtually everyone. These loose fit baggy jeans are perfect for creating a balanced look, concealing any minor imperfections, and elongating your legs.

Versatile Colors and Sizes: Available in 8 classic colors and 5 different sizes, these women's denim pants trousers cater to various style preferences and body types. Whether you prefer classic blue, black, or other trendy shades, there's a pair that's just right for you.

All-Season Wear: Perfect for summer, spring, fall, and winter, these jeans are incredibly versatile. Pair them with different tops for various occasions, whether it's a casual day out, a day at the office, or a special date. These classic and trendy bottoms are a must-have addition to any wardrobe.
